meta_description: Highlights at the Cartoon Art Museum of recommended exhibits, events and more!
hours_text:
## Open daily (except wednesdays) 11am to 5pm

# LOCATION

**781 Beach Street, Fl 1  
San Francisco, CA 94109**

The Cartoon Art Museum is located at 781 Beach Street, San Francisco, on historic Fisherman’s Wharf, just steps away from Ghirardelli Square, Hyde Street Pier, and the Cable Car turnaround, with an impressive view of San Francisco Bay and the Golden Gate Bridge. Take a break from sightseeing and come visit us!

[ Directions ](/directions-index)

# Hours and Holidays

Museum Hours

11am to 5pm  
Daily (except Wednesdays)

**The museum is closed on:**  
New Year’s Day  
Easter Sunday  
Independence Day (July 4th)  
Thanksgiving Day  
Christmas Day

# ADMISSION

  * Adults – $10

  * San Francisco Resident – $7

  * Students/Senior/Military/Educator   
(with valid ID) – $6

  * Kids (6-12) – $4

  * Children (5 and Younger) – FREE

  * Cartoon Art Museum Members – FREE

The first Tuesday of every month is our   
**Pay What You Wish Day**.

**Please note: Groups of 10 or more are strongly discouraged on Pay What You Wish Day.**

[Educational groups can reserve on any other day and receive a 50% discount.](/groups)

## 

## San Francisco Museums For All

The Cartoon Art Museum is a proud participant in San Francisco Museums For All, a program that provides low-income residents with free or reduced admission to local museums and cultural centers.

**EBT, SNAP & MediCal cardholders receive free admission for up to 4 people per visit.**

Visit: <https://www.sfhsa.org/san-f...
